ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: He could have, but to the best of my knowledge, he has never posted either the logs or that he has verified it with logs.  note that i am not saying it isn t
ygData.messageBody:
He could have, but to the best of my knowledge, he has never posted either the
logs or that he has verified it with logs. note that i am not saying it isn't true, i
believe that there probably is a soft cap on resists just like ac and probably atk.

At 06:24 PM 2/25/01 -0500, you wrote:
>could he (my guildleader, as you know) possibly have used logs instead
>of his inside verant connection? the other night against Zland, he
>showed who resisted or did not resist his disease breath and how many
>times, for example.
>
>Shada
>
> > the uberguild leader IS a bard, hehehe.
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
